snippet.title: Red Faction (2001) - IGN Gameplay Vault
snippet.description:
Get ready for the new Red Faction Armageddon by checking out gameplay straight from the original Red Faction for PS2!

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more: http://www.ign.com 

Want this week's top videos? Sign up: http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
